DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study report outcomes deep anterior lamellar keratoplasty ( DALK ) use big-bubble technique .
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To report outcome deep anterior lamellar keratoplasty ( DALK ) use big-bubble technique . Methods : Thirty four unselected consecutive patient submit DALK big-bubble technique . Intraoperative postoperative complication , postoperative uncorrected visual acuity ( UCVA ) , best spectacle-corrected visual acuity ( BSCVA ) , spherical equivalent ( SE ) , corneal topography , endothelial cell density evaluate . All patient follow least 6 month .
DOC.criteria: keratoconus central endothelial cell count less 2000 cells/mm2 glaucoma intraocular pressure great 21 mmHg amblyopia retinal abnormality diabetes mellitus steroid immunosuppressive treatment connective tissue disease
